author: Christopher Roche
content: of course the ultimate record of 54 days was set in an earlier time by Harbo and Samuelson in 1896 when they rowed the greater distance from Norfolk beack NY to the scillies. The a whole day later set off to row onwards to Le Harve and up the seine to Paris.
